评论详情: It kept sliding off my face. The fit is better on a bigger face frame. If you don’t have that bigger nose bridge,  it will slide right off your nose and face. It is big and nice looking though. Thick and durable. Good protection and stylish. Just won’t work for smaller face.

Exceeded my expectations! I love them. The frames are thick and not easily scratched! Definitely a great dupe for the original aviators by Tom Ford.

These are a really good bargain to try out a style that is on-trend and inspired by a particular luxury brand with sunglasses of the exact same style. I like the yellow-caramel toned lenses and thick frames. The black/yellow contrast looks chic. These don’t however look particularly high end; you can tell they’re plasticky frames and not resinous or substantial feeling like the luxury counterpart, though they fit comfortably on the face/bridge of the nose. But for the price, they came with a cleaning cloth and drawstring storage pouch, and they do look trendy on – enough to pull off a look with an entire ensemble, or to wear as grab-n-go sunglasses. The lenses are said to have ‘maximum UV protection’ which is good. These are affordable enough to wear for a season or just a specific ‘look’ to indulge in a trendy style at a fraction of the cost for luxury brand equivalents. They’re definitely better made than many other sunglasses in the same price class!

The OSAGAMA Trendy Retro Oversized Aviator Sunglasses are lux for less. This is a great mirror of the luxury branded style popular across the fashion set. The frames are well formed and lightweight with details that elevate it above similar items. These glasses fit the width of my face and rest lightly on the nose without squeezing or creating an imprint. The lenses are firmly set and reduce eye strain. These can be worn with very casual outfits and give an edge to more formal outfits. Great deal for the price.

Trendy retro sunglasses, from the moment I first put them on, I was struck by their elegant design and craftsmanship. The oversized frame exudes a sense of sophistication, while the metallic inlays add a contemporary twist that's hard to resist. They also provide maximum UV protection, ensuring my eyes are shielded from harmful rays without compromising on style. Plus, the luxurious packaging they arrived in made the experience feel even more special, adding a touch of luxury to the whole affair. Whether I'm out for a casual stroll or attending a formal event, these sunglasses have become my go-to accessory for both fashion and function.
